website_summaries.verdict: Whether you are trying London Butter polish for the first time or have an extensive collection, Molly Coddled is a beautiful and practical shade with excellent shine and wear.
pros: Versatile for various occasions, outfits, and seasons
Boasts a high-gloss finish and long wear
cons: If you aren't into pink, this color may not be for you

customer_reviews.title: It's a no-go
customer_reviews.text: I love butter so much but I was actually really disappointed with this product. The pigment was surprisingly thin (I had to put on three coats just to get a solid color) and it takes F O R E V E R to dry. I painted my nails at 6 PM, went to bed at 11, and woke up with scratches and scuffs all over my nails. So frustrating. I love butter London but this product is so not worth $18! Color: twist & twirl. Coats:3. Dry time: 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Too thick, not like a fresh Butter London nail polish
customer_reviews.text: This polish is terrible. It's not the problem of the polish itself since I already owned several, there is a problem with the way it is stored. It's way too thick and too gloopy for a fresh Butter London nail polish. Butter London polishes are famous for being thin and easy to layer. Layering the second coat on top of the first one isn't an easy task for the polish I've got. Very disappointed I can't send it back. Had to order a new one directly from the brand. Waste of money and time.
customer_reviews.author: KateWayTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed, looked like a cool salmon/orange color online but ...
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed, looked like a cool salmon/orange color online (Trout Pout) but is definitely pink when applied. I'm not a fan of pink, so I'm not thrilled. I do like that it's not overly smelly though.
customer_reviews.author: gingerjules16

customer_reviews.title: more than I hoped
customer_reviews.text: This nail polish is phenomenal. The color is beautiful and the quality top notch. The polish lasts a really long time and doesn't chip. I have a nail fungus infection on my toe nails and nothing has been helping. I have to cover up the ugliness with polish so I can wear my open toed shoes but this prevents using any treatment. This polish contains tea tree oil that helps to treat fungus so I was hoping it would help my situation. I have seen a great improvement in my a reduction in the fungus and the health of my toenails.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Butter London makes quality nail polish
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy to find this retired color of polish at amazon at a fair market price. The Yummy Mummy color is the perfect tan for a very neutral look on my nails. It goes on almost shear and dries quickly with a nice shine. A second coat will increase the saturation of color as it easily glides on for a smooth finish that doesn't take too long to dry. The applicator is the right width and flexibility to easily "stay within the lines" while painting my own nails. .
customer_reviews.author: Rare Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Love this nail polish!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing this nail polish almost exclusively since I bought it. I love the Butter London line of products. This polish looks more brown in the picture, but after it's on it is a deep pink or rose shade with a hint of brown. It goes on so smoothly and I've found that it lasts for a number of days before I notice any chipping. I don't usually baby my hands for the sake of the polish, but go ahead with what I have to do. This line of nail polish really does shine even without a shiny top coat. I really love this color. The name of this one is Yummy Mummy.
customer_reviews.author: S. Warfield

customer_reviews.title: Great neutral color for spring & summer!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect neutral color! Butter London has really improved since I tried it 3 yrs ago. This polish lasts a week with average wear & tear. They've also enlarged the brush for better coverage!
customer_reviews.author: RNLindaS

customer_reviews.title: Nice polish overall though but the formula could use some ...
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about this product but I have some issues with it- the color is very sheer and very streaky, making it hard to apply and needs more than they typical 2 coats. Nice polish overall though but the formula could use some improvements.
customer_reviews.author: HBlady

customer_reviews.title: Very streaky
customer_reviews.text: This was my first Butter London polish. It wasn't at all what I expected. After two coats, it still looked very streaky and I don't have time to put a third coat on every time I want to wear this shade so I don't think it's the right shade for me... Also, it looks like Amazon will not allow this to be returned to them because it's flammable and cannot go thru the mail...this makes no sense since they sent the polish to me in the mail. I learned my lesson...I won't buy another polish from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: M.J.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m curious if this is really a Butter polish. It’s extremely un-shiny (even though it’s called Patent Shine 10X). Also, no matter how dry I let the coat get, any topcoat takes off enough of the polish at the end of the nail that it becomes translucent. Besides the quality issue, the color is nice. One coat is a neat semi transparent purplish greige (maybe a little sickly looking). Two coats becomes opaque.
customer_reviews.author: MichaelS

customer_reviews.title: Thought it was meh, was surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I was prepared to love this, but the brush is broad and weird, and the polish was thicker than I expected, making it difficult to apply evenly. I guess I'll go back to other brands.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: New to this line, loving the outcome
customer_reviews.text: New to this brand and idea of 5 and 7 free. Very happy with their products. Not always clear in the descriptions exactly what size/ozs you are getting in the purchase. Colors are true to their pictures. A bit pricey for these items, but for a person with nails that are otherwise paper thin, who gave up wearing nail polish due to continual splitting with the use of both acetone remover and non 'free' polishes, the change to these newer 'free' products and a non-acetone remover have made a great deal of difference in my ability to wear polish.
customer_reviews.author: ljvirgo

customer_reviews.title: Superb Formula
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using this polish and while expensive, I must say that the formula is a perfect consistency for an even application and it is super long lasting. I'm pretty sure you're supposed to use it by itself so I didn't even put on a base or top coat and my super red nails lasted over 5 days without a chip even though I washed dishes and pans without a DW or gloves. If I hadn't done that I really think I could have gone well into a week easily. Quick and easy, and super long lasting. Very, very impressive. I now need them to expand their colors so I can stock up. Sheer pale pink please?
customer_reviews.author: Soapy8

customer_reviews.title: This shade is not for people with pale cool-toned skin
customer_reviews.text: Yummy Mummy is a fine polish but it looks terrible against my skin, which is very pale, freckled, with blue/pink undertones. I'm a classic "Winter" in coloring. If your coloring is like mine, don't make the mistake of buying Yummy Mummy! In fact, I'm having trouble finding a classy nude-ish polish from Butter London that would work with my skin. (My fave of all time is Essie's Demure Vix, but I've made a commitment to use polishes that have fewer/no toxic ingredients.) If I find one, I'll update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Pretty autumnal color
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I thought it would match a jacket I'm wearing to an event. (I just hoped the color on my computer matched the color in real life!) It was perfect. When I tried it on my fingernails, it seemed to be too thick. But the woman who does my pedicure had no problem applying it and said it was just fine. (I blame the "thickness" on my fingernails on my inexperience.) It has a nice shine and is a lovely autumnal color.
customer_reviews.author: Viola Player

customer_reviews.title: Awesome color!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome color!!!... I adore nude tones... This color compliments my olive complexion very well... I also purchased a lipgloss that matches exactly... The only issue is the cap that covers the main brush cap... It wasn’t attached probably and I just leave it on for asthetic purposes... I tried gluing the gold cap to the main cap and it doesn’t work out right... It’s only the cap design I have issues with... Other than that, it’s a wonderful polish... No streaking (one coat)... Flows on your nails like buddddaaaa lol... A little goes a long way... Less is more... I highly recommend this polish...
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Geisha

customer_reviews.title: Pricey But Worth It
customer_reviews.text: This brand works so well for me. I have thin nails prone to breaking, and most nail polish doesn't last well for me. This product has such good shine and wear. I am not great at manicure stuff by any means, but the polish goes on so evenly, lasts well, and looks so good that my friends think that I go to a salon to have my nails done. Worth the price when you consider what it costs to go to a salon.
customer_reviews.author: Happy & Blessed Survivor

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Muted  Color .Long Lasting Polish
customer_reviews.text: London polish has always been excellent. This color, Toff , is an oldie but goody and it is perfect. The shade can be worn with many different colors of clothing from burgundy, pink browns rusts and beige to blues and greens. It is,muted so I there is no clash. This is great quality product..wears well and has a long shine life. All and all a great color and a terrific line of nail products.
customer_reviews.author: I Shop 2

customer_reviews.title: Not the same color as before.
customer_reviews.text: This seems not to be right product. The color is nothing like the one I bought before. I am not sure what have changed or if this is an original product. You can tell how different is the color and bottle is. Also, it chips very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Fonolla

customer_reviews.title: I love the color
customer_reviews.text: I love the color! A great shade that isn't quite black but is still dark. Made me laugh actually, it is a dark earl grey color and is perfect for layering under lighter sheer/shimmery shades or standing on it's own dark grey color. Either way, it lasts a week much better than other polishes and I am really happy with both wear and color.
customer_reviews.author: RedJ3di

customer_reviews.title: Will buy more for sure!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Looooooove this polish, have had on for a week now and just barely chipping. Other polishes and manicure last a couple days then need to be removed.
customer_reviews.author: Leggab

customer_reviews.title: beautiful shade of red
customer_reviews.text: Love Butter London nail polish. This is a beautiful shade of red, and has nice shine and lots of pigment. Two coats covered perfectly. Their nail polish always lasts at least a week on my nails. Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: likes to shop

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem like the formula I have gotten in the past. Color seems 'off'.
customer_reviews.author: missy

customer_reviews.title: This the best color. I get compliments all the time
customer_reviews.text: This the best color. I get compliments all the time. This is the only polish I have ever bought where the polish last for months. It's amazing. I bought my last one middle of Dec and I am still using it. I use the polish every day and it's still going. It's definitely worth the price! What else can I say it's the best!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Love this color! Geat for the Fall!
customer_reviews.text: This color is very nice and It would look nice on any skin color - IMO. You do need to have a strong base and top coat for the color to last longer than a week, but overall, this color/brand goes on smooth and looks very pretty on. I may have to purchase one more so I don't run out next Fall, I like the color that much. Good purchase for me!
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: True to picture pretty color - London Fog
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Pretty color, true to the picture. Goes on smoothly. The top over the actual bottle cap was a challenge for my nail technician, but other than that, great!
customer_reviews.author: DeLiQ

customer_reviews.title: Best nail polish ever
customer_reviews.text: This brand is only nail polish that lasts on my nails for nearly a week. And I am not nice to my nails. The color Toff is gorgeous. It has a slight purple hue. It’s professional but unique.
customer_reviews.author: Sessa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful nail color!!
customer_reviews.text: This color is stunning and the nail polish goes on easily and smoothly. No lines or streaks. Just two coats and you’re done. Dries quicker than Essie or OPI as well! I’ll definitely be ordering more colors!!
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Conner

customer_reviews.title: The color is yummy
customer_reviews.text: I have this polish tucked away into brief cases, luggage, my car. Goes on quickly, dries fast and you will receive so many compliments on Yummy Mummy - it’s a fanstastic neutral for any season
customer_reviews.author: CageCrow

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors/lasts up to two weeks
customer_reviews.text: Best nail polish ever! Beautiful Colors. Lasts almost 2 weeks. I tried a friend’s during a visit & immediately bought my own. Adding new colors as the seasons change
customer_reviews.author: Elena deMurias

customer_reviews.title: Color advertised is not what shows up in your order!
customer_reviews.text: This looked nothing like the color advertised. I thought I was getting a light pink. And it is white. See pic of the color, against my white tile. Don’t buy this. Also you can’t return it.
customer_reviews.author: Piper

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS POLISH
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS POLISH!!! It really does last, and I am hard on my nails. To me, it is worth the extra money. I don't need to get gel polish because this one lasts so well, which cuts my salon manicure costs in half. I do wish they had more colors available.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lefko

customer_reviews.title: Always happy with Butter nail polish
customer_reviews.text: The color is reliable in one or two coats. The khaki green is great for fall. Butter makes strong nail polish for the price. You won't regret trying it!
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Brown Polish
customer_reviews.text: Color: "Keep Calm". Great polish, but the product looks more like a dark burnt orange when in the bottle. When applied to the nail, it's definitely brown.
customer_reviews.author: Kinipela

customer_reviews.title: NOT PINK!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this color if you think it's pink. This color twist and twirl is not even close to being pink; it's more like the color of putty.
customer_reviews.author: greeneyedlady

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware, Horrible
customer_reviews.text: After using, tried to contact seller for a refund. This product is unusable. Buyer beware, I just spent $60 on cuticle treatment, base coat and polish. Thick, gooey, chalky, does not go on smoothly. I so wanted to love this : (
customer_reviews.author: HBS

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but Great Long Lasting Polish
customer_reviews.text: ButterLondon is expensive for sure, but I am a fan. I have yet to find another brand that is clean (free of harmful chemicals) and lasts as long. It doesn't chip and comes off easily. Not sure why it's not rated better.
customer_reviews.author: Peck

customer_reviews.title: Great brush; makes application easy
customer_reviews.text: In all their descriptions they fail to tell you what a great brush it is, makes applying the polish as easy as can be; sorry there are negative reviews because i think it's about the best
customer_reviews.author: sally r.

customer_reviews.title: Color and presentation are nice
customer_reviews.text: Lovely color. I could not apply without clumping, the consistency was thick and elastic
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne R

customer_reviews.title: Awful don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this zero stars I would. Absolute crap and non returnable or refundable! Almost $20 for a bottle and it chips immediately. Absolute bull. DONT BUY THIS.
customer_reviews.author: ANDREA MURRAY

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: love the color, how evenly it goes on and the brush is great. Only issue is it started chipping within 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Blalock

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I thought the price was high but I tried it anyway. The polish last longer than I expected. Still wearing after Valentine day and its been over a month
customer_reviews.author: Mic

customer_reviews.title: disappointing and waste of money and time.
customer_reviews.text: The polish was recommend by a friend who loves is so I'm somewhat confused with why mine is horrible. I'm curious about the review mentioning it might be stored improperly prior by this seller. I've tried to use my bottle 3 times. It streaks each time. When I try multiple coats it looks uneven. Wears off quickly. Disappointed you can't return it or contact the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Sheldon

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality. Shiny and nice. My mom loves this color so I actually gave it to her. A little bright for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer W

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous silver top
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color and the polish was smooth; however the top leaves a bit to be desired. It comes off and when I picked it up the bottle separated from the top and broke. I only used it once and it was all over the floor. I was heart broken. I would advise you to throw away the fancy top before this happens to you. No sure if it was supposed to come off like that but it did.
customer_reviews.author: Siray Freeman

customer_reviews.title: The Best...
customer_reviews.text: This is the color I have been looking for for years....ideal neutral dusty pink. The polish itself goes on easily and seems to last forever...I just threw out 10 bottles of other brands that I will no longer use. This will be my signature color and polish forever...thank you !
customer_reviews.author: pinetree

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this polish. It has been about 5 days and it didn’t chip even one bit. Incredible !
customer_reviews.author: Shopper123

customer_reviews.title: Best Color
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is this color makes your toes look fabulous!! And there's nothing better than Butter for going on smoothly and evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Broken bottle ruined entire contents of amazon order
customer_reviews.text: Package came and bottle was broken and spilled all over the other items in the box. A corner of the bottle chipped and broke and it was spilled everywhere. A lot of money for a bottle of polish that’s now more than half empty and useless. I love Butter polish. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is nice quality polish - doesn't chip as quickly as some polishes.
customer_reviews.author: sd

customer_reviews.title: Happy Color, Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this color! Cute packaging and very easy to apply. I almost always ruin my right hand but find the brush is easy to control and I don't paint all over my hands. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: bthomas

customer_reviews.title: Last's along time
customer_reviews.text: This polish is worth the price, it looks good for at least 7 days on me. And I use my hands a lot. This shade is a nice neutral color, grey/taupe
customer_reviews.author: Bryce H.

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty color. Had a very hard time opening bottle ...
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty color. Had a very hard time opening bottle as some polish had leaked around opening. Very surprised to see the mess that I had to clean off the bottle threading and plastic top underside. Either that, or bottle had been used.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous polish!
customer_reviews.text: Took a long time to arrive BUT a great polish! I’m allergic to regular polish and find the other hypoallergenic polishes to be low quality. But this one is as good as the standard professional quality polishes. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Athena

customer_reviews.title: Do not order - arrived hard and no return
customer_reviews.text: This arrived half empty and completely dry and hard. I contacted e seller but no answer. This was a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: B. H. Piper

customer_reviews.title: Changed, not for the better
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the Butter base that was previously available. I do not like the 2 new ones, base and shine.
customer_reviews.author: Bari M.

customer_reviews.title: This was not what I hoped it would be.
customer_reviews.text: This would not go on smoothly the second coat ruined the dry first coat.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa C.

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: This polish truly last for a long time depending on your daily activites of course. On my hands it last about 10 days before chipping and on my toes it last two weeks before chipping.
customer_reviews.author: Ronni

customer_reviews.title: Love the color but it takes forever to dry and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the color but it takes forever to dry and the shine fades. The first time applying I did 2 coats back to back. I waited an hour, fell asleep and woke up with my fingers stuck to the polish. So yesterday I did one coat at a time, waited an hour between coats. This morning the color had faded on some nails. I added one more coat waited an hour and finished with a top coat right away and so far so good. It takes 3 coats to cover. So far keeping the color but I need to really work it to have it looking nice. I am a huge Butter fan, but this particular color is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Lang

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much darker than expected. Too chalky looking for my taste.
customer_reviews.author: rockymtngrl1

customer_reviews.title: Total ripoff
customer_reviews.text: Watery and cheap. Colors are all way off from pictures.
customer_reviews.author: ShouldProbablyUseAmazonLess

customer_reviews.title: Good polish, bad brush.
customer_reviews.text: Love the polish. Durable, dries quickly but I don't care for the brush. Some of the bristles were loose and came off on my nails. Need a shapelier brush.
customer_reviews.author: High Country Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Feet
customer_reviews.text: This is the only color I use for my Pedicures
customer_reviews.author: Cathy L Goram

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed I like London from nail salons
customer_reviews.text: The colors were different then shown. Then couldn’t return even unopened. Too expensive for guessing colors and no return. I would have returned in same bubble Rapp and mailer. Told I could send but same as them
customer_reviews.author: Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This butter London is a very good nail polish, appreciate the prompt handling if my order.
customer_reviews.author: P. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Forever to dry, and color is inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: This color is horrible. First, it takes an unnecessarily long time to dry, but even worse- the color is uneven. It's almost like it turns ombre the more it dries. Perhaps this color is best with three coats instead of two, but who has time for that? Definitely not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: JennE

customer_reviews.title: Matte and perfect
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it! It has a smell, but it's nothing too annoying. You only need one coat, but you can add more if you want.
customer_reviews.author: bb

customer_reviews.title: Okay if you like dark
customer_reviews.text: Love Butter London, but not this color. The bottle is two times darker than the image and the polish is two times darker than the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Norris

customer_reviews.title: I loved this nail polish as a way to break from ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved this nail polish as a way to break from gel nails. I've received loads of compliments on the shade..Yummy Mummy!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: GREAT polish- worth extra $$ This stuff lasts too!!!
customer_reviews.text: About a month back I came on Amazon as I do daily.......and found this luscious color called Yummy Mummy.....I am a nail polish addict and tend to only buy OPI...........had never tried Butter before...it's a bit expensive.......but this stuff looks EXACTLY as the shade index and it LASTS! LOVE this stuff!! Plus even after 3-4 coats it comes off so easily but doesn't chip. I had a couple coats on that lasted two weeks before I had to do any touch ups and I'm hard on my nails typing a lot all day etc. And now I'm going broke buying several other shades....plus it dries nicely too....so, so long OPI......helllllllllllllllo Butter!
customer_reviews.author: IrishLass

customer_reviews.title: Good quality nail polish and great color
customer_reviews.text: Such a good neutral. Light grey with a hint of light blue. Super shiny. Stays on and doesn’t chip.
customer_reviews.author: LALA901

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous color but not sheer at all as i’d hoped ...
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous color but not sheer at all as i’d hoped. This is a very opaque Barbie pink on the nail, which is flattering only for 5 year olds.
customer_reviews.author: LucyBell2

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Too thin and watery. Took five coats to cover my nails, but the color is true. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: EmilyDickinson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: This particular color stays on longer than any other one. I use a quick dry on top about every other day for a week.
customer_reviews.author: tea diva

customer_reviews.title: Nail polish actually comes off with alcohol not just nail ...
customer_reviews.text: Nail polish actually comes off with alcohol not just nail polish remover. Would need a top coat to stay on. Also took forever to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Summers

customer_reviews.title: This nail lacquer has a nice brush and the color is nice
customer_reviews.text: This nail lacquer has a nice brush and the color is nice. It's a dark gray and looks almost black. It didn't last very long on my nails even with a base coat and a top coat.
customer_reviews.author: VCK

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy.  Damaged products.
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was prompt. Coming up Rose's is a beautiful color. Polish is old and very thick. Cannot be thinned. Polish cannot be returned. I am so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not pink
customer_reviews.text: Not really very pink like I was hoping. Very washed out color
customer_reviews.author: Jaden Reyna

customer_reviews.title: Not a premium product
customer_reviews.text: Premium price for a non-premium product. My wife said it peeled within first 24 hours after applying.
customer_reviews.author: Dan D.

customer_reviews.title: Chipped and Streaky
customer_reviews.text: I usually love Butter London polishes, but this one was streaky and chipped the second day. Not worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: JennieB

customer_reviews.title: Not a recommendation
customer_reviews.text: Expensive for such streaky coverage. Beautiful colors but I won't purchase again
customer_reviews.author: eastcoast

customer_reviews.title: Great if your pregnant
customer_reviews.text: Great if your pregnant, but it's a little hard to work with. I found it to be very chalky and streak!
customer_reviews.author: Megan F.

customer_reviews.title: Nice color but chips like any other
customer_reviews.text: Nice color but lasted no longer without chipping (my main reason for purchase) than any other polish.
customer_reviews.author: Video Game Master

customer_reviews.title: Color much darker than pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Love Butter less toxic nail polish, but not a fan of this color. Darker than pictured.
customer_reviews.author: LaJoie

customer_reviews.title: Ta Da yuck
customer_reviews.text: The polish is great, the color is the issue. What color is it???? Please save your money this is the most ugly uncolor ever. Few stars because of the weird color
customer_reviews.author: Julie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality nail polish and color similar to the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Keep Calm is brown, not orange
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge fan of Butter London. Great products, fast drying, incredibly well pigmented. Keep Calm however was a disappointment. The swatch online lead me to believe this was orange, but it's much darker. More of an orangey brown.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this nail polish. Stays on forever. Loved the color for short trim nails.
customer_reviews.author: BNorth

customer_reviews.title: expired
customer_reviews.text: this product came with the polish spilled out on the rim and the nail polish was thick and unusable. I had to throw it away unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: IPHIGENIA L KOUMENIS

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The color was pretty but the paint peeled off completely in a few days, not worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Brielle

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great color, quality, two coat coverage, still very expensive for the size.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous pink color, rich in pigment and lasted so long! My nails grew out before a single chip and I often wear running shoes. Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: daniel gauntner

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The color is not the way it appears in picture.
customer_reviews.author: Judith H. Ellington

customer_reviews.title: Quality is NOT worth the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price it’s not worth it. Polished my nail and did two coats. In less than 24 hours the shine is gone nails looked very dull and polished chipped on every single nail.
customer_reviews.author: David H. Thornhill

customer_reviews.title: Not a good value
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't last any longer than cheap nail polish. Way over priced. Gave it 2 stars for nice shade.
customer_reviews.author: Dg

customer_reviews.title: I really like that this nail polish is formaldehyde free
customer_reviews.text: I really like that this nail polish is formaldehyde free. The top is a little tricky to open but it looked great when applied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nails!
customer_reviews.text: Color exactly as pictured. The polish wears well and stands up to day to day activity. Received earlier than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need to brighten the color or add shine
customer_reviews.text: Love that it stays on longer than most but i expected the color to be more vibrant and shinier.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Despite padded packaging, bottle leaked in shipping
customer_reviews.text: Bottle leaked, the polish spilled in packaging, and the bottle can’t be opened. Color looks nice, wish I could use it. I’ve ordered nail polish from Amazon before without any issue, this is very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Only one coat needed - great coverage and lasts long
customer_reviews.text: I can get by with one coat and I feel confident that I'm using a low hazardous product.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia A Grych

product_meta.title: butter LONDON Patent Shine 10X Nail Lacquer
product_meta.description:
Color:Molly CoddlledA high gloss nail lacquer that is long lasting with a chip-proof finish and a rapid drying time. This double patented formula delivers a long-lasting manicure with a rich and lustrous color payoff in a single coat.

BRAND STORY
butter LONDON
